mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photos (restaurant_id, request_restaurant_id, user_id, url, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{restaurantId}, #{requestRestaurantId}, #{userId}, #{url}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE photos SET status = 'APPROVED', reject_reason = NULL, updated_at = NOW() WHERE photo_id = #{photoId}
UPDATE photos SET status = 'REJECTED', reject_reason = #{reason}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE photo_id = #{photoId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM photos WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM photos WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SLECT * FROM photos WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY created_at DESC
